author: dennisl
msg: Make sure that all source files have Javadocs for the class and the correct license

author: wsmoak
msg: Modify the apps-it pom so the module can be built alone without specifying a profile.
When building from the top, the integration module is only included if -Pitest is used.

author: wsmoak
msg: Exclude the transitive dependencies on myfaces-api and portlet-api that come from Commons Chain.
The commons-chain 1.1 pom should have marked these as optional.

author: dennisl
msg: [MCHANGES-43] Improve compatibility with the Maven 1 changes plugin
